title: What's your scariest dream that you can remember?
body:
I had a dream about a giant ass polar bear [INB4 VOLI JOKES] and I was on top of a tin roof on a building some of my friends were on top of it and some were on the ground getting chased and slaughtered by the polar bear and by slaughtered I don't mean, just eaten and it doesn't look too bad... I mean gorey and bloody as all hell!

Then the Giant polar bear about the size of a small building was trying to take people off of the building slashing and clawing at my friends and taking them down while they screamed... I finally was left and the monster finally got me and I woke up :) It had a realistic feel about it, which made it worse lol.
